attributes.action: RESPECT THE LEAVE VOTERS WHO WERE LIED TO ABOUT THE NHS AND CANCEL BREXIT NOW
attributes.additional_details:
The claim that £350 Million would be spent on the NHS was central to the Leave campaign. Nigel Farage has now admitted this was a lie. 

The claim made by the Leave camp was an act of disinformation: a deliberate and calculated falsehood with the sole purpose of manipulating the electorate to win the referendum. 

We are the Brexiters who are furious with Boris Johnson and Nigel Farage and will not stop until democracy is served: the decision to leave the EU must be overturned.
attributes.background:
Nigel Farage now says that the £350m pledge to fund the NHS was 'a mistake'.

Leave voters are expressing their anger (or 'Bregret') over the lies told to them.

www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/brexit-anger-bregret-leave-voters-protest-vote-thought-uk-stay-in-eu-remain-win-a7102516.html
